name: Dont Get Caught By The Light
name_original: Dont Get Caught By The Light
description:
Dont Get Caught By The Light

Controls (Keyboard):

Spacebar: Jump

Criteria:

Stealth - Player get hit only by the light, if from behind the enemy the player kill it.

Purple - the game pallete is only purple and yellow.

Jump - jump to another room.

Wham! Sounds - when jump, when get the soul, when get by the light and when hit the enemy.

Credits:

Art, Programming, Design: andrensaraiva - instagram.com/andrensaraiva
